Uses of Package
orego.mcts

  • Packages that use orego.mcts 
    Package Description
    orego.decision  
    orego.mcts
    Player classes implementing Monte-Carlo tree search.
  • Classes in orego.mcts used by orego.decision 
    Class and Description
    Lgrf2Player
    The last-good-reply (with forgetting) player, responding to two moves.
    McPlayer
    A Monte-Carlo player.
    McRunnable
    Players use this class to perform multiple Monte Carlo runs in different threads.
    MctsPlayer
    Monte-Carlo tree search player, using the UCT algorithm.
    RavePlayer
    A player using the RAVE improvement on UCT.
  • Classes in orego.mcts used by orego.mcts 
    Class and Description
    McPlayer
    A Monte-Carlo player.
    McRunnable
    Players use this class to perform multiple Monte Carlo runs in different threads.
    MctsPlayer
    Monte-Carlo tree search player, using the UCT algorithm.
    RavePlayer
    A player using the RAVE improvement on UCT.
    SearchNode
    A node in the search tree / transposition table.
    WLSResponseMoveList
    Simple container object which manages a list of moves, their associated WLS states, and a list of top K moves from this list.
